products.name: feature-flag-service-lite
products.label: Feature Flag Service (Lite)
products.short_description: Deploys a single, free 'Lite' plan instance of the IBM Cloud App Configuration service for feature flags.
products.long_description: This deployable architecture provisions one instance of the App Configuration service on the 'Lite' plan. This service provides a full UI and SDKs (similar to LaunchDarkly) for managing feature flags, user segmentation, and controlled rollouts for your applications.
